name: We Are!
text:
[Main] Look at the top 4 cards of your deck, reveal 1 card with a cost of 4 or more and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
[Trigger] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

effect.text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck, reveal 1 card with a cost of 4 or more and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
